mapper.select: select name, modelId, model ,count(*) as count from orders where substr(tranDate,1,7) = #{yyyymm} group by name, modelId, model
select name, sum(accessory) as totalAccessory, sum(notAccessory) as totalNotAccessory from orders where substr(tranDate,1,7) = #{yyyymm} group by name
select name, sum(accessory) as totalAccessory, sum(notAccessory) as totalNotAccessory from orders where substr(tranDate,1,7) = #{yyyymm} group by name
select name, count(*) as secondHandPorscheCount from orders where substr(tranDate,1,7) = #{yyyymm} and secondHandCarTypeId = '189' group by name
select name, count(*) as secondHandNotPorscheCount from orders where substr(tranDate,1,7) = #{yyyymm} and secondHandCarTypeId != '189' and secondHandCarTypeId != '104' group by name
mapper.update: update orders set name=#{name}, model=#{model}, modelId= #{modelId}, accessory=#{accessory}, notAccessory=#{notAccessory}, payMode=#{payMode}, secondHandCarType=#{secondHandCarType}, secondHandCarTypeId=#{secondHandCarTypeId}, secondHandCarDetail=#{secondHandCarDetail}, secondHandCarDetailId=#{secondHandCarDetailId}, tranDate = STR_TO_DATE(#{tranDate},'%Y-%m-%d'), modDate = STR_TO_DATE(#{modDate},'%Y-%m-%d') where id = #{id}
